tool.name: Step 3: TIS calling
tool.description: Finds all TISes in your ribosome profiling data.

param.name: sqlite_db
param.label: Sqlite DB with RIBO-seq data after transcript translation
param.help: The sqlite results database should at least contain output from the RNA-seq mapping (RIBO-seq) and transcript translation tools.

param.name: transcriptfilter
param.label: Filter transcripts based on
param.option: No filter (i.e. only protein_coding + non protein_coding with RPF exon_coverage)

param.name: local_max
param.label: enter the range wherein the peak has to be the local maximum. (must be >= 1)

param.name: R_aTIS
param.label: enter the Rltm - Rchx value for aTISes

param.name: min_count_aTIS
param.label: enter the minimum profile coverage for an aTIS site

param.name: R_5
param.label: enter the Rltm - Rchx value for 5'UTR TISes

param.name: min_count_5
param.label: enter the minimum profile coverage for an 5'UTR TIS site

param.name: R_CDS
param.label: enter the Rltm - Rchx value for CDS TISes

param.name: min_count_CDS
param.label: enter the minimum profile coverage for a CDS TIS site

param.name: R_3
param.label: enter the Rltm - Rchx value for 3'UTR TISes

param.name: min_count_3
param.label: enter the minimum profile coverage for a 3'UTR TIS site

param.name: R_no_trans
param.label: enter the Rltm - Rchx value for no_translation TISes

param.name: min_count_no_trans
param.label: enter the minimum profile coverage for a no_translation TIS site

data.name: out_sqlite
data.label: SQLite DB with mapping/tr and TIS calling results (step 1-2-3)

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool searches for all possible TISes within known Ensembl transcripts. Only TISes passing a number of specified arguments are being withheld. The minimal profile coverage and Rltm - Rchx parameter setting can be specified for each annotation class (5'UTR, annotated TIS (aTIS), coding sequence (CDS), 3'UTR, no translation(no_trans)) ::
Local maximum: The newly identified TIS should have the maximal number of reads within a down- and upstream window of x basepairs. Minimal profile coverage: The minimum number of ribosome profiles on a TIS-site (after combining the reads, because of subcodon specificity, on ATG or near cognate start positions). Rltm - Rchx: Value calculated according to the function mentioned below. The TIS should have a value equal or higher to the parameter setting.
Rk = (Xk/Nk) x 10 (k = LTM, CHX), Xk number of reads on that position in data k, Nk total number of reads for transcript.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Input**
An sqlite database holding experimental data from the RNA-mapping (RIBO-seq) and Transcript translation.
A species and annotation-version specific sqlite Ensembl database. The location of this database should be included in the ENS_db.loc file, located in the main tool directory.
The species and annotation-version specific igenome. The location of this directory should be included in the igenomes.loc file, located in the main tool directory.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
An sqlite database holding all experimental data from the RNA-mapping (RIBO-seq), transcript translation and TIScalling tool. After TIScalling 2 extra tables will be added and/or updated.
